explanations.support vector machine: The paper mentions the use of a support vector machine (SVR) based model for effective wind speed estimation (EWSE).
explanations.SVM: SVM is mentioned as the method used in the EWSE model (SVR stands for Support Vector Regression, a variant of SVM).
explanations.regression: The use of SVR (Support Vector Regression) implies that the paper involves regression tasks for wind speed estimation.
